title: Alex James in Columbia The Cocaine Diaries Panorama 2008 01 28
description:
BBC.America.Reveals.2008.01.28.Alex.James.The.Cocaine.Diaries.360p.LDTV.aka.BBC.One's.Panorama.Cocaine.Alex.James.in.Columbia.ABC.AU.WEBRIP.[MPup]
Low-Definition Television (LDTV) ABC iview WEBRIP: 640x360

[b]This is an ABC AU presentation of the BBC America Reveals Documentary [i]Alex James - The Cocaine Diaries[/i]. It also aired on BBC 1's Panorama as [i]Cocaine: Alex James in Columbia[/i].[/b]

Format: MPEG-4
Size: 640x360
FrameRate: 25.000 fps
AudioCodec: AAC
Channels: 2 channels
SamplingRate: 44.1 KHz

Former cocaine addict Alex James accepts an invitation from Colombia's President to experience first-hand the effects of the cocaine industry on Colombia and its people.

[img]http://extraimago.com/images/2015/07/29/a2f0a0540ed20128eb485a34bbb2333f.png[/img]

[img]http://extraimago.com/images/2015/07/29/1671535aa404e990687efe79754dc87a.jpg[/img]

Alex James, the bass player in the band Blur, once bragged that he spent over $1.5 million on cocaine at the height of his addiction. Invited by the president of drug-ravaged Colombia to see just where his money went, Alex takes a trip across the Atlantic and witnesses firsthand the toll that the illicit trade in cocaine is exacting on this country and the people who live there
